reviews.text: We stayed here for one night at the end of our trip before we headed back to the airport very early. We had 3 rooms with A/C but the A/C was very temperamental. Decorations were shabby with newspaper being used for lining in the wardrobe.
reviews.title: You get what you pay for, and for the price it was very good!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We ate lunch at the restaurant which was delicious and reasonably priced. The staff were generally friendly, although some more than others.
reviews.title: Peaceful haven

likes.liked: — The size of the room, and the friendliness of the staff
likes.disliked: — Negombo Town centre is about a mile away, along a busy road
